reviewText: superb sassy, version of "If You Could See Me Now" probably the best she ever recorded. Listen for out chorus on "I Hadn't Anyone Til You"
I bought this year's ago on VHS and wanted to replace with DVD. The old copy was worn out and it was never released on DVD

seeing a live recording of sarah is like no other.

this tape captures the magic of her range. her play-

fullness and dramatic prowess. if you are a sarahaddict

like me or have any good taste in great music, do

yourself a favor and purchase this video.

oh and im not bias.
